content.rendered:
Vmaxinfo Institutehas additional division of I-Tech Placement with hundreds of clients and their requirements of candidates. We are one of the most renowned recruitment service company in Pune. We manage interviews of suitable candidates according to their skill and requirement of industry.

    Candidates are requested to send their resume at hr@itechplacement.com or you may cal 9096871111
